definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Le 7:21 detestation, detestable thing ;—´[[שׁ]]: of the ceremonially unclean. Le 7:21; creatures forbidden as food: water animals without fins or scales Le 11:10, Le 11:11, Le 11:12, birds of prey, etc., v:Le 11:13, winged creeping things v:Le 11:20, v:Le 11:23, creeping vermin v:Le 11:41, v:Le 11:42 (all P), cf. Is 66:17 (+ [[בְּשַׂר הַחֲזִיר]], [[הָעַכְבָּר]]); v. RS:Sem. i. 275, 2nd ed. 293; K 309 f., 2 nd ed. 311 f.—Ez Eze 8:10 read prob. [[שִׁקּוּחִים]], v. [[שִׁקּוּץ]].
